img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 47.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Bitter_47.jpg)
At the top of the stone stair path, there's a small side path leading back to a spot with a Ginsengling overlooking the enclosure, and a tunnel. Take the tunnel, and you'll find a shortcut back toward the North Shore Shrine, but first you'll need to deal with a few Monk Supporters holding their heavy stones.
img_below_text:
The closest one in the tunnel entrance guards a **Treasure Chest** with a Mind Cor and materials inside, but try to take them on one at a time to make things easier. Follow the tunnel path to find a green Wisp, and it will empty out right at the larger tunnel entrance leading to the next main area.
![Wukong Bitter 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f3/Wukong_Bitter_49.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Bitter 47.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Bitter_47.jpg)

Take the tunnel, and you'll find a shortcut back toward the North Shore Shrine, but first you'll need to deal with a few Monk Supporters holding their heavy stones."
        - Following Text: "The closest one in the tunnel entrance guards a **Treasure Chest** with a Mind Cor and materials inside, but try to take them on one at a time to make things easier. Follow the tunnel path to find a green Wisp, and it will empty out right at the larger tunnel entrance leading to the next main area.
![Wukong Bitter 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f3/Wukong_Bitter_49.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the player character approaching a tunnel entrance guarded by a Monk Supporter. The character is poised to engage the enemy, who is protecting a treasure chest containing a Mind Cor and materials. The setting is a rocky cave environment, and the image highlights the strategic approach needed to tackle the enemy one at a time to access the treasure and progress through the tunnel to the next area.
